archimate:DataObject.name: Microledger
archimate:DataObject.documentation: A cryptographic data structure maintained over a single Connection that enables two or more Agents to securely share Pairwise DIDs, Public Keys, Service Endpoints, and other Identity Data. See Sovrin Microledger.
